net.grinder.console.model
Class ModelTestIndex

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.console.model.ModelTestIndex

public final class ModelTestIndex
extends Object

Immutable snapshot of current test structure that is valid at time of notification. The test indicies used are numbered between 0 and getNumberOfTests() - 1 and are not related to the test numbers apart from sharing the same ordering.

Package scope.

Author:
Philip Aston
See Also:
SampleModel.Listener.newTests(java.util.Set, net.grinder.console.model.ModelTestIndex)
